output.sentences: Today there was a soccer tournament, and they were playing in a all male group.
The yellow team chased the ball , that the blue team had.
As the blue team about to score, everyone stands up to cheer for the blue team like a family.
The yellow team kept running and cornered the blue team.
In the final seconds of the game, the two team members clashed and it was getting really exciting.
